name: Spell Mastery

sections.body: Each time you take this feat, choose a number of spells that you already know equal to your Intelligence modifier. From that point on, you can prepare these spells without referring to a spellbook.
sections.name: Benefits

sections.body: Without this feat, you must use a spellbook to prepare all your spells, except read magic.
sections.name: Normal

description: You have mastered a small handful of spells, and can prepare these spells without referencing your spellbooks at all.
